title: Park Yoga
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Wow! What a big park~! It must be so nice to do yoga here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Remember when you invited me for some beach yoga before? That felt good, so I looked up something similar you can do around here. I came across this thing called park yoga.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>“Park yoga” sounds great! It’s because you can do it on the grass, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s right. Shall we get to it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hold on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari also looked up some new yoga poses. Something the two of us can do as pairs!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>....You say that, but you’re gonna do stuff like Nozomi again, aren’t you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What!? Put some faith in me, Elichika!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, I’m just kidding! Okay, please tell me, Mari!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
